amendment.description: To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide a penalty for knowingly selling advertising that offers certain commercial sex acts.

action.text: Amendment SA 273 as modified, under the order of 4/21/2015, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 97 - 2. Record Vote Number: 162.

Amendment SA 273 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Kirk. (consideration: CR S2326, S2332-2333;text as modified: CR S2326) To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide a penalty for knowingly selling advertising that offers certain commercial sex acts.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 273 as modified, under the order of 4/21/2015, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 97 - 2. Record Vote Number: 162.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 273 as modified, under the order of 4/21/2015, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 97 - 2. Record Vote Number: 162.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 273 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Kirk.
